page.title: 11Recreation
page.content:
Several types of recreation are pursued around the area. Walking is a favourtite pastime with most of the population and there are some good footpaths especially along the banks of the Oxford Canal.
Boating is very popular on the Canal in summer when the water becomes crowded with narrow barges which can be hired locally.
There is a recreation ground in the village where games of football are played between local teams.
The air base has a large sports centre but this is only used by military personnel.
